categories.title: Beef - Meat
categories.description: Beef is the culinary name for meat from cattle, particularly skeletal muscle.

categories.title: Chicken - Meat
categories.description: Chicken is a type of domesticated fowl, commonly used for meat and eggs.

categories.title: Desserts - Dessert
categories.description: Dessert includes sweet foods like cakes, pastries, and ice creams.

categories.title: Lamb - Meat
categories.description: Lamb, hogget, and mutton are the meat of domestic sheep.

categories.title: Miscellaneous - Other
categories.description: General foods that don't fit into another category.

categories.title: Pasta - Pasta
categories.description: Pasta is a staple of Italian cuisine, often made from wheat flour and water.

categories.title: Pork - Meat
categories.description: Pork is the culinary name for meat from a domestic pig.

categories.title: Seafood - Seafood
categories.description: Seafood includes fish, shellfish, and other edible marine life.

categories.title: Side Dishes - Other
categories.description: A side dish is a food item that accompanies the main course.

categories.title: Starters - Other
categories.description: A starter is a dish served before the main course.

categories.title: Vegan Dishes - Vegan
categories.description: Vegan dishes contain no animal products, including meat, dairy, or eggs.

categories.title: Vegetarian Dishes - Vegetarian
categories.description: Vegetarian meals exclude meat but may include dairy and eggs.

categories.title: Breakfast Dishes - Breakfast
categories.description: Breakfast is the first meal of the day, often including cereals, eggs, and toast.

categories.title: Goat Meat - Meat
categories.description: Goat meat is widely used in various cuisines worldwide.

categories.title: Duck Meat - Meat
categories.description: Duck is a flavorful meat used in many gourmet dishes.

categories.title: Salmon - Seafood
categories.description: Salmon is a popular fish known for its rich flavor and high omega-3 content.

categories.title: Tuna - Seafood
categories.description: Tuna is a widely consumed fish, often eaten fresh or canned.

categories.title: Soups - Other
categories.description: Soups are liquid-based dishes, often made with vegetables, meats, and broths.

categories.title: Spaghetti - Pasta
categories.description: Spaghetti is a popular type of pasta, often served with tomato-based sauces.

categories.title: Lasagna - Pasta
categories.description: Lasagna is a layered pasta dish with cheese, meat, and tomato sauce.

categories.title: Cheesecake - Dessert
categories.description: Cheesecake is a creamy dessert made with cream cheese and a biscuit base.

categories.title: Pancakes - Dessert
categories.description: Pancakes are thin cakes made from batter, often served with syrup.

categories.title: Cookies - Dessert
categories.description: Cookies are sweet baked treats, often made with chocolate chips or nuts.

categories.title: Salads - Vegan
categories.description: Salads are fresh dishes made with vegetables, fruits, and dressings.

categories.title: Fruits - Vegan
categories.description: Fruits are natural, sweet foods rich in vitamins and fiber.

categories.title: Oatmeal - Breakfast
categories.description: Oatmeal is a healthy breakfast dish made from oats and milk or water.

categories.title: French Toast - Breakfast
categories.description: French toast is bread soaked in eggs and milk, then fried.

categories.title: Sausages - Meat
categories.description: Sausages are ground meat encased in a skin, often grilled or fried.
